exceptions.tactic: intros l e e' l1 l2 H_sorted H_e_in H_le H_remove H_l1_eq H_e_in' H_eTerm_neq H_e'_in H_e'_neq.

original: intros l e e' l1 l2 H_sorted H_e_in H_le H_remove H_l1_eq H_e_in' H_eTerm_neq H_e'_in H_e'_neq. apply in_app_or in H_e_in'. destruct H_e_in' as [H_e_in_l1 | H_e_in_l2]. - apply removeAfterIndex_in_app_l' in H_e_in_l1. rewrite H_remove in H_e_in_l1. contradiction. - apply removeAfterIndex_in_app in H_e_in_l2. rewrite H_remove in H_e_in_l2. rewrite app_assoc_reverse in H_e_in. apply sorted_app_sorted_app_in1_in2 in H_sorted. + destruct H_sorted as [H_sorted _]. apply H_sorted with (e' := e') in H_e_in_l2. * rewrite <- H_l1_eq in H_e_in_l2. contradiction. * auto. + rewrite app_assoc. auto. + auto. + apply in_or_app. right. auto.
